title: Homeopathic Medicine
description: Our Licensed Naturopathic Doctor provides Homeopathic Medicine and Services. We have patients visiting our Naturopathic Clinic from Stittsville, Ottawa, ON.
sitename: Dr. Karim Alami, ND - The Gut Health Doctor
cleaned_text: Natural Healing Homeopathic Medicine is a holistic modality that requires a remedy selection based on the patients symptomatic picture, their personality traits and even their character picture. It is a form of energetic medicine that works by stimulating the body's innate ability to heal itself and resolve any disharmonies that may be blocking it from achieving optimal health. As a registered Naturopath with a Homeopathic Diploma background, I have the necessary tools to understand and connect with my patients on a deeper level, allowing me to provide outstanding Homeopathic and Naturopathic services.
